ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 04/27/2020 10:27 AM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Cough. COMPARISON: CHEST TWO VIEW 11/06/2019 3:00 PM. TECHNIQUE: 2 views. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is new patchy airspace disease in the right lower lobe. The left lung is clear. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. Mediastinum: Heart and mediastinal contours are unremarkable. No definite aortic calcifications are seen. Other: None. IMPRESSION: New patchy airspace disease in the right lower lobe, suspicious for pneumonia.
